citation.article-title: Numerical taxonomic study of fast-growing soybean rhizobia and a proposal that Rhizobium fredii be assigned to Sinorhizobium gen. nov.

p.s: Description of Sinorhizobium xinjiangensis sp. nov.
Sinorhizobium xinjiangensis (xinj.ji.ang.e≈Ñsis. M. L. adj. xinjiangensis, from Xinjiang, referring to rhizobia isolated from the suburbs of Xinjiang, People's Republic of China),
The characteristics are those described above for the genus and in Tables 2 and 3.
The cells have one polar flagellum or peritrichous flagella.
The type strain of S . xinjiangensis (strain CCBAU 110) is the center strain of the species subgroup in numerical analysis.
